short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Industry Index Extension for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on is for job-hunting sites, to display additional information to the user and help them make more informed decisions. 

Functionality includes; a Living Wage calculations by state, State and Local minimum wages, and approximate takehomes after standard withholdings. 

Currently only functions on Indeed, but further compatibility is planned in the future!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This software helps you make more informed decisions as you investigate companies. Use does not constitute legal or financial advice towards what you should or should not do.
